entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
